parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Positions

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Preloads area to be used with [[findEmptyPosition]] command and returns [[true]] when area is ready. The size of the area preloaded is from <tt>center - radius - maxDistance</tt> to <tt>center + radius + maxDistance</tt><br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> important </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Preloading large areas may take a long time, we are talking minutes. However once preloaded, it stays preloaded even after mission restart</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> center '''findEmptyPositionReady''' [radius, maxDistance]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> center: [[Array]] - Search area center position in format [x,y] or [x,y,z] in which case z is ignored. Accepts [[Position2D]] or [[Position3D]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [radius, maxDistance]: [[Array]] -

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> radius: [[Number]] - distance from the center
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> maxDistance: [[Number]] - distance from the end of radius

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] when ready

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> Preload aread within 500m: <code>_ready = _center [[findEmptyPositionReady]] [0, 500];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[findEmptyPosition]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]</root>
